General.Name: Hangcha Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Hangcha Group Co., Ltd manufactures and sells forklift products in China and internationally. The company offers lithium e-trucks, e-trucks, IC - trucks, pallet trucks, pallet stackers, reach trucks, order pickers, tow tractors, very narrow aisle trucks, rough terrain trucks, aerial platforms, explosion proof forklifts, and AGVs. It serves retail/wholesale, food/pharma, transport/logistics, manufacturing, automotive, ports/terminals, chemical/energy, forestry/wood, and other industries. The company was founded in 1956 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

6.Name: Mr. Sai Min  Chen
6.Title: Sec. to Board of Directors & Assistant to GM
